intro: Elatostema atroviride var. laxituberculatum, commonly known as the glossy leaf elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves that are typically ovate to elliptic in shape. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are clustered in terminal inflorescences. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Asia and is often found in moist, shaded environments. The leaves are covered with fine, pubescent hairs, giving them a distinctive texture.
